p_1: Web Dev Weekend was a site made for Scotty Labs's Web Dev Weekend event used to teach students proper front & back-end web development practices.
p_3: The Web Dev Weekend website was an experimental look at merging fundamental web development (HTML & CSS) with P5.JS for graphical components. The content of the website (text, images) were laid out & organized using HTML & CSS. Certain elements were given special IDs that could be tracked by JQuery and sent over to P5.JS for graphical rendering.
